Row.Text: Hmph, well met. I suppose you do not know who I am? I am the one who shall unite all of China! None shall stop my ambition!
Greetings. So long as you do not get in the way of my ambition, I bid you no harm. Perhaps you would like to join me in my dream of conquest?
The glorious empire of Wei bids you welcome! However, I shall be the one to crush all with my ambition!
It appears that ambition... can only take you so far...
I am willing to concede this one battle, but not the war...
C-could it be that my ambition was not enough?
Now you shall see why I am known as the Hero of Chaos!
You dare go against my ambition? Run them through! I don't want a single enemy left alive!
You have made a careless mistake. Ready your blades men! I want the enemy's main camp by sundown!
You have gotten in the way of my ambition for long enough!
My ambition starts, and your life ends!
I seek the future! None shall stop me!
I demand this for my ambition!
Could you perhaps lend a hand to help fulfill my ambition?
I come for this.
You have bested me. You are different than you once were.
Absolutely not! I want more!
No! That will not do!
This is not enough for my ambition!
I know you are reasonable man. I need more than this.
Do you not know of my ambition? This is not enough.
No. Not quite enough.
As it stands now, your offer is unfair to my ambition. Please improve it.
Can you do a little better?
That's not quite good enough.
Almost…
One cannot trade with a person who does not believe in ambition. Now begone!
I am sure you meant me no disrespect, but I cannot accept your terms.
I find your offer insulting. I refuse it.
I will take this, but I object to it very much.
Very good. This will aid in all ambition.
A fair agreement both of our nations will benefit from. It is agreed.
Here are my terms. I urge you to take them.
You would do my ambition a great honor by accepting this agreement.
Greetings. I believe that this will benefit both of our peoples. What say you?
Begone! Your very presence gives dishonor to my people.
With great reluctance, I must refuse your request.
Your behavior is unbecoming.
It appears that I have no choice. But I will avenge this dishonor! Now, begone.
As a guest and a friend, I can refuse you nothing.
Very well, it appears that I have no choice. But I shall avenge this humiliation; I swear it!
You are playing a dangerous game. My ambition cannot be stopped.
Very well. The next time I shall not be so polite!
You have lost your reputation for this in the eyes of my people.
How very disappointing.
Indeed? I trust that you will not live to regret your short-sightedness.
How foolish of you.
You have lost against the might of my ambition! For the glory of Wei!
Greetings. Have you set out on your ambition lately?
What is it that you want?
Your very presence disturbs my ambition. What is it?
Now perish!
You realise that everything that I do not own is rightfully mine, don't you? That includes the land you are taking.
So that you do not destroy the greatest thing on this forsaken earth, you had best do as I ask.
You are too stupid to understand, but this trade shall be good for you.
May the open borders of our empires strengthen both of our ambitions!
